text: Birch Bayh, "wrote the 26th Amendment, adopted in 1971, setting the national voting age at 18. It settled an issue dating to World War II, when the slogan 'old enough to fight, too young to vote' gained currency."

text: .@RepEliotEngel tells @libcasey & @Rho_Co that the #SOTU was "schizophrenic." And says that he did not wait this year for the seat by the aisle like he did during the Obama years and said that tradition had been "fun while it lasted."
